extendedInfo.description: This application helps one synchronize counting with the beats in a rhythm accurately. One can also set a preferred beat interval. Each round is set in a sequence of 4-4-6-2 beats. One can configure the # of rounds in a stage. It offers 3 stages and each stage can be started manually at an appropriate time. The application also alerts a user on the last round in each stage and offers a variety of other useful settings. This application should be used under appropriate guidance and recommendation only.

reviews.title: Must Have for all ART OF LIVING Teachers (NEW)
reviews.comment: Wow... What an app... Android rocks....I think this is a must have app for all the art of living teachers as it helps to set the rhythem of counts which we give during 3 stage Pranayam. Just Practice with it.. its amazing and I love thisssssssss
reviews.author: A Google User
